text: Kare-ra (majutsu-shi) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, watashi-tachi ni shimesa reta meihakuna shirushi, mata watashi-tachi o sozo nasa reta kare ijo ni, anata o omonjiru koto wa fukanodesu. Sorede anata no kettei sa reru koto o jisshi shite kudasai. Daga anata wa, gense no seikatsu ni oite dake, hanketsu nasaru ni sugimasen
